channel.title: Very annoying problem :L [Project Insanity]
channel.description:
Okay so i've been trying to 15 + minutes to fix this i've gone to the exact lines of the error it shows i've replaced the code of the error etc, but no matter what i can't fix it... Any help? Please :D That's the error under this.
[code][2/16/12 6:36 PM]: Game saved for player Andrew [2/16/12 6:36 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [2/16/12 6:36 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Client.java:226)

item.title: Very annoying problem :L [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Found my problem in the destruct method in client.java
if(inDuelArena() && o.disconnected == true) {
getTradeAndDuel().duelVictory();
}

Not sure what was wrong with it, but its fixed now

Read full topic

item.title: Very annoying problem :L [Project Insanity]
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

check to see if the player is saving any null things or has any null items.

Read full topic
